name: ORS Invalid Key Dates
description:
This report returns a list of prisoners who have incorrect Key Dates and for lifers returns prisoners who have an incomplete sentence history. The report prompts for a single establishment code at runtime.
DQ0006 v1.0 Last Modified: 20/10/16

dataset.name: Everyone Else
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER.LAST_NAME, AT_OFFENDER.FIRST_NAME, AT_IMPRISON_STATUSES.IMPRISONMENT_STATUS, DT_CURR_SENTENCE_LENGTH.CURR_EFFECTIVE_SENTENCE_LENGTH, AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.ARD_OVERRIDED_DATE, AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.CRD_OVERRIDED_DATE, AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.ARD_CALCULATED_DATE, AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.CRD_CALCULATED_DATE, AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.NPD_CALCULATED_DATE, AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.NPD_OVERRIDED_DATE, AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.MTD_CALCULATED_DATE, AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.MTD_OVERRIDED_DATE, AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.PRRD_CALCULATED_DATE, AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.PRRD_OVERRIDED_DATE, AT_OFFENDER_SENTENCES.SENTENCE_STATUS, AT_HEADER_BLOCK.STATUS_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_SENTENCES AT_OFFENDER_SENTENCES, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDERS AT_OFFENDER, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_BOOKINGS AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS, OMS_OWNER.CASELOAD_AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS, OMS_OWNER.IMPRISONMENT_STATUSES AT_IMPRISON_STATUSES, OMS_OWNER.V_HEADER_BLOCK AT_HEADER_BLOCK, (SELECT B.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID, B.EFFECTIVE_SENTENCE_LENGTH AS CURR_EFFECTIVE_SENTENCE_LENGTH FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS B WHERE B.CALCULATION_DATE = (SELECT MAX(A.CALCULATION_DATE) FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS A WHERE B.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID = A.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID)) DT_CURR_SENTENCE_LENGTH, USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_IMPRISON_STATUSES AT_OFFENDER_IMPRISON_STATUSES WHERE (AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID = AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID (+)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_IMPRISON_STATUSES.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID (+) = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_SENTENCES.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID (+) = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_IMPRISON_STATUSES.LATEST_STATUS = 'Y' OR AT_OFFENDER_IMPRISON_STATUSES.LATEST_STATUS IS NULL) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGENCY_LOCATION_TYPE = 'INST') AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID = DT_CURR_SENTENCE_LENGTH.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID) AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_)) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.CASELOAD_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID (+)) AND (NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID IN ('OUT', 'TRN') AND NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.CASELOAD_ID IN ('ADMINC', 'CADM_I', 'MULTI')) AND (AT_IMPRISON_STATUSES.IMPRISONMENT_STATUS (+) = AT_OFFENDER_IMPRISON_STATUSES.IMPRISONMENT_STATUS) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID = AT_HEADER_BLOCK.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID (+)) AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_)) AND ((AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.IN_OUT_STATUS IN ('IN', 'OUT') AND (AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATION_ID = (SELECT MAX(A.OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATION_ID) FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS A WHERE AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID = A.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID)) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_)))), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, LAST_NAME, FIRST_NAME, IMPRISONMENT_STATUS, CURR_EFFECTIVE_SENTENCE_LENGTH, ARD_OVERRIDED_DATE, CRD_OVERRIDED_DATE, ARD_CALCULATED_DATE, CRD_CALCULATED_DATE, NPD_CALCULATED_DATE, NPD_OVERRIDED_DATE, MTD_CALCULATED_DATE, MTD_OVERRIDED_DATE, PRRD_CALCULATED_DATE, PRRD_OVERRIDED_DATE, SENTENCE_STATUS, STATUS_DISPLAY, AGY_LOC_ID, 'TBD' AS V_CASE_ADMIN FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: Lifers
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER.LAST_NAME, AT_OFFENDER.FIRST_NAME, AT_IMPRISON_STATUSES.IMPRISONMENT_STATUS, CURR_EFF_SENT_LEN.CURR_EFF_SENT_LEN, DT_OFFENDER_LIFE_FLAG.LIFE_SENTENCE_FLAG, COUNT(AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATION_ID) AS OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATION_ID34, AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.CREATE_USER_ID FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDERS AT_OFFENDER, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_BOOKINGS AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS, OMS_OWNER.CASELOAD_AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS, OMS_OWNER.IMPRISONMENT_STATUSES AT_IMPRISON_STATUSES, (SELECT OFF_BOOK.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID, CASE WHEN LIFE_FLAG.LIFE_SENTENCE_FLAG = 'Y' THEN 'Life' ELSE SENT_CALC.EFFECTIVE_SENTENCE_LENGTH END AS CURR_EFF_SENT_LEN FROM (SELECT DISTINCT OFFENDER_SENTENCE_TERMS.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID, OFFENDER_SENTENCE_TERMS.LIFE_SENTENCE_FLAG FROM OFFENDER_SENTENCE_TERMS WHERE OFFENDER_SENTENCE_TERMS.LIFE_SENTENCE_FLAG = 'Y') LIFE_FLAG, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS SENT_CALC, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_BOOKINGS OFF_BOOK WHERE (OFF_BOOK.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID = SENT_CALC.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID (+)) AND (LIFE_FLAG.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID (+) = SENT_CALC.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID) AND SENT_CALC.OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATION_ID = (SELECT MAX(A.OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATION_ID) FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS A WHERE SENT_CALC.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID = A.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID)) CURR_EFF_SENT_LEN, (SELECT DISTINCT OFFENDER_SENTENCE_TERMS.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID, OFFENDER_SENTENCE_TERMS.LIFE_SENTENCE_FLAG FROM OFFENDER_SENTENCE_TERMS WHERE OFFENDER_SENTENCE_TERMS.LIFE_SENTENCE_FLAG = 'Y') DT_OFFENDER_LIFE_FLAG, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_IMPRISON_STATUSES AT_OFFENDER_IMPRISON_STATUSES WHERE (AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID = AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID (+)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_IMPRISON_STATUSES.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID (+) = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_IMPRISON_STATUSES.LATEST_STATUS = 'Y' OR AT_OFFENDER_IMPRISON_STATUSES.LATEST_STATUS IS NULL) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGENCY_LOCATION_TYPE = 'INST') AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID (+)) AND (NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID IN ('OUT', 'TRN') AND NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.CASELOAD_ID IN ('ADMINC', 'CADM_I', 'MULTI')) AND (DT_OFFENDER_LIFE_FLAG.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID (+) = AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID) AND (CURR_EFF_SENT_LEN.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID (+) = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID) AND (AT_IMPRISON_STATUSES.IMPRISONMENT_STATUS (+) = AT_OFFENDER_IMPRISON_STATUSES.IMPRISONMENT_STATUS) AND ((AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.IN_OUT_STATUS IN ('IN', 'OUT') AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATION_ID = (SELECT MAX(A.OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATION_ID) FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS A WHERE AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID = A.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID)) AND AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.CREATE_USER_ID = 'XTAG') GROUP BY AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER.LAST_NAME, AT_OFFENDER.FIRST_NAME, AT_IMPRISON_STATUSES.IMPRISONMENT_STATUS, CURR_EFF_SENT_LEN.CURR_EFF_SENT_LEN, DT_OFFENDER_LIFE_FLAG.LIFE_SENTENCE_FLAG, AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.CREATE_USER_ID HAVING COUNT(AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATION_ID) = 1), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, LAST_NAME, FIRST_NAME, IMPRISONMENT_STATUS, CURR_EFF_SENT_LEN, LIFE_SENTENCE_FLAG, OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATION_ID34, CREATE_USER_ID, 'TBD' AS V_CASE_ADMIN FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: Case Admin
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_PEOPLE.FIRST_NAME, AT_PEOPLE.LAST_NAME FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDERS AT_OFFENDER, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_BOOKINGS AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS, OMS_OWNER.CASELOAD_AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS, OMS_OWNER.PERSONS AT_PEOPLE, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_CONTACT_PERSONS AT_CONTACTS WHERE (AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGENCY_LOCATION_TYPE = 'INST') AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID (+)) AND (NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID IN ('OUT', 'TRN') AND NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.CASELOAD_ID IN ('ADMINC', 'CADM_I', 'MULTI')) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID = AT_CONTACTS.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID (+)) AND (AT_PEOPLE.PERSON_ID (+) = AT_CONTACTS.PERSON_ID) AND ((AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND AT_CONTACTS.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y' AND AT_CONTACTS.RELATIONSHIP_TYPE = 'CA')), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, FIRST_NAME, LAST_NAME FROM dataset_base_)

filter.name: prefilter_
filter.query: prefilter_ AS (SELECT * FROM dataset_ WHERE LIFERS_MAIN_LEGAL_STATUS IN ('LIFE','ALP','DLP','DPP','HMP','HMPL','IPP','LR_IPP','LR_LIFE','MLP','SEC53','SEC90','SEC90_03','ALP_LASPO','DFL','LR_ALP','LR_ALP_LASPO','LR_DLP','LR_DPP','LR_MLP','SEC93','SEC94','SEC93_03'))

field.name: $ref:V_CASE_ADMIN
field.legacySql: =([CP Last Name]+", "+[CP First Name]) In ([Case Admin].[NOMS Number])

filter.name: prefilter_
filter.query: prefilter_ AS (SELECT * FROM dataset_ WHERE (MTD_CALCULATED_DATE IS NULL AND MTD_OVERRIDED_DATE IS NOT NULL AND EVERYONE_ELSE_MAIN_LEGAL_STA31 IN ('DTO','REFER','DTO_YOI','DTOR_104','DTOR_105','DTO_ORA') AND CURRENT_EFFECTIVE_SENTENCE_L44 IS NOT NULL))

field.name: $ref:V_CASE_ADMIN
field.legacySql: =([CP Last Name]+", "+[CP First Name]) In ([Case Admin].[NOMS Number])

filter.name: prefilter_
filter.query: prefilter_ AS (SELECT * FROM dataset_ WHERE (CURRENT_EFFECTIVE_SENTENCE_L44 IS NOT NULL AND CURRENT_EFFECTIVE_SENTENCE_L44 <> '00/00/00' AND EVERYONE_ELSE_MAIN_LEGAL_STA31 NOT(IN ('DTO','REFER','DTO_YOI','DTOR_104','DTOR_105','LIFE','IPP','HMPL','ALP','DLP','HMP','SEC53','SEC90','SEC90_03','DPP','MLP','LR_IPP','ALP_LASPO','DFL','LR_ALP','LR_ALP_LASPO','LR_DLP','LR_DPP','LR_MLP','DTO_ORA','SEC93','SEC94','SEC93_03')) AND (ARD_OVERRIDE_DATE IS NOT NULL OR NPD_OVERRIDE_DATE IS NOT NULL OR CRD_OVERRIDE_DATE IS NOT NULL OR PRRD_OVERRIDE_DATE IS NOT NULL) AND (ARD_CALCULATED_DATE IS NULL AND NPD_CALCULATED_DATE IS NULL AND CRD_CALCULATED_DATE IS NULL AND PRRD_CALCULATED_DATE IS NULL)))

field.name: $ref:V_CASE_ADMIN
field.legacySql: =([CP Last Name]+", "+[CP First Name]) In ([Case Admin].[NOMS Number])
